description:
The five members of Love Rice are both excited and focused as they look ahead to their Harvest Festival appearance. Then An, Shokku, and Kyari, the hottest HarveStars from the Sacred Bread High School, arrive on the scene. After seeing their far superior Harvest Show, the girls who once cheered for Love Rice turn their attention to Yeast King.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: それゆけイーストキング
